attributes.action: Extend The Stamp Duty Holiday to 30/6/21 as a result of 4/1/21 announcement.
attributes.additional_details: The Government has increased the restrictions primarily relating to education. Those wishing to take advantage of the stamp duty holiday should be given further time to take advantage of the scheme. With the population being encouraged to work from home & children being homeschooled, this will decrease the pressure on all those involved in the process. In addition, due to the new strain, it will allow more time to view properties safely.
attributes.background: The deadline should be moved to the 30th June 2021 given the recent lockdown. This will allow all parties in the chain who are adhering to the requirements sufficient time to conclude transactions safely.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extend the Stamp Duty Holiday for an additional 6 months after 31st March 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550545

Extend the Stamp Duty Land Tax holiday in light of the spike in CV19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551713
